title: Rainy night city driving, almost stopped, braking frequently

reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly and carefully due to the rainy and dark conditions. It frequently brakes to avoid collisions with other vehicles or pedestrians. The driver is paying close attention to the traffic lights and stop signs, ensuring safe navigation through the city street.
